channel.title: Just Some Object and Item Help
channel.description:
Item Help: How do I make it so if you use a knife (item id = 946) on a set of logs (item id = 1511) it will make a Short bow (u) (item id = 50) And where do I add it?
Object Help: How do I make it so when you click on a table (object id = 4459) you get 10k (item id = 995, 10000) and get 80k xp in theiving (skill = 17) and where do I place the code?
Thanks.

item.title: Just Some Object and Item Help
item.dc:creator: @Da_0wnz Da 0wnz
item.description:
@Da_0wnz wrote:

[quote=“silabgarza, post:2, topic:266955”]item on item packet, i think packet 53?

object packet, no clue, just search like a ladder code that works… or something lol

lol were not dealing with 508s here lol were in 317 area. There aren’t any real “packets” and lol the code helps but now i don’t know where to place it lmao

or ur theiving tables
wuld look like this tho
if (object 4459) {
addItem(995, 10000);
sendMesage(“you theive 100k from the table thing”);
addSkillXP("80000, playerLevel[Theiving]);
}

idk lol gl[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Just Some Object and Item Help
